quixote la man— service retreat— resolved pass life discreet— villadiego called si— maintained reti— found secret well-be— according celesti— book divine except sin— speech plain opin— rocinante rocinante fa— great-grandson great babie— lean bon— one quixote own— matched well weak— never took short commons meek— kept corn steal— trick learned lazaril— piece straw neat— blind man wine cheat—
